body.name: Table-Mate Ultra Folding TV Tray Table and Cup Holder, Adjustable to 6 Heights and 3 Angles with Device Holder (Black)
features: ✅ FROM THE ORIGINAL TV TRAY EXPERTS - Our intentionally LIGHTWEIGHT sturdy TV Tray is designed to flex slightly when heavily loaded (up to 40 POUND CAPACITY) and built with powder-coated STEEL LEGS and a food-rated polypropylene top

✅ A GREAT VALUE - Features you won't find anywhere else; our Slide and Glide BUILT-IN CUPHOLDER adjusts to any angle so you'll never spill another drink; DEVICE HOLDER slot on the tray allows you to safely use and store your phone or tablet, CURVED TRAY table top conforms around you for extra comfort

✅ 18 TABLES IN ONE - Fully and easily adjustable to 6 HEIGHTS and 3 ANGLES for any reading, eating or working needs to keep you comfortable; No need to strain and bend to accommodate an uncomfortable table

✅CLOSE COMFORT - Effortlessly pull table towards you as legs slide easily under and around couches and chairs; Unique, sturdy design means there is no extra cross-bar to get in your way, get caught on floors or cause bumps to the table
✅ EASY TO ASSEMBLE AND STORE - Absolutely NO TOOLS NEEDED to assemble and when not in use simply fold to its compact size and store next to a couch or in a closet

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Redefines TV Trays We’ve designed the perfect multi-functioning TV tray tables for your home, apartment, or dorm. Compact, but it adjusts to 6 heights plus 3 tilt angles. No more headaches or backaches! It’s ideal for tight spaces. And now Table-Mate Ultra is curved to hug your body for more comfort. Making your life even easier. Thoughtful Design Curved to sit right up against your body, no need to bend or reachBuilt-in slot safely holds smart phones & tablets, allows for easy chargingOpen base allows legs to stretch without hitting tableNo lifting TV dinner trays, easily pulls to avoid bending and reachingAssembles quickly - no toolsDetailed assembly instructions included with every Table-Mate tray table A Breeze to Use! Simply slide table surface to horizontal position. It's ready! When finished, fold it back down. Store next to chair, under sofa, or in closet.Angle the tray table top up or down depending on use. Easy Compact Portable Table for Any Activity Makes meals super convenient, accident and spill freeIdeal height and angle for reading, laptop tray typing, or writing thank-you notesPerfect creative space for painting, drawing, or arts and craftsSpace-saving home-office workstation or student deskHave a party with this TV tray set – great for sports watching

Table-Mate II Table-Mate Ultra Table-Mate XL Table-Mate V Built-In Cup Holder ✓ ✓ Device Holder ✓ Curved Tray ✓ Larger Table Top ✓ ✓ Wider Base ✓ Powder-Coated Steel Legs ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ 40 LB Capacity ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ 6 Height Adjustments ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ 3 Angle Adjustments ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: Works just fine. It wobbles just slightly but not enough to be a problem. The legs are thick and strong. The cup holder is ok but not all that useful. It's a bit stiff to pull out. I use a large coffee mug that's too big for the cup holder. The iPad/iPhone slot works just fine. It has a wide range of height adjustments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for using my iPad
reviews.reviewText: I use my Ultra model exclusively for my iPad and it works perfectly without giving me a painful neck. As you can see from my photo, I have it angled down and at the maximum height so I can cross my legs, and often use a soft stand that I already owned. That works well for me. With all the height adjustments and the choice of a flat table or angled down, I would think everyone could find a way to hold their device at the correct angle for viewing. I like the way this particular table can easily slide on a rug to fit comfortably close to me, especially with the curved surface on this model. I usually don’t use the slot in the rear for my device, although if I also need a surface for writing, that does work out well. As others have said, it is a bit wobbly, but fine for lighter objects, even if used as a TV tray. I do not use the cup holder since I like the table at an angle. Oh, and I put it together in less than 5 minutes. Altering the angle of the tabletop is very easy, but changing the height required the help of my husband to squeeze the buttons on the legs. Not fancy, but just right for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is great as a side table if you wanna eat on it and watch TV but not really great for a laptop
reviews.reviewText: I like the ease of access of being able to assemble this little table and I didn't even need the instructions! However after I assembled it I discovered that it wasn't as sturdy as I thought it would be! It's still a great design overall and I love the cup holder but it still causes the table to wobble when you put a drink in the drink holder! When I put my laptop on it my laptop wiggles and I can't really adjust the height of the the table itself to the proper height I need when I'm sitting on a couch or if I'm sitting at a desk it does never come to the proper height it's either too high or too low! But it was a really good price and I can see myself using it for other things besides well my laptop!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s just as described
reviews.reviewText: Works well for my needs. Cup holder and the slot at top for pens etc are nice features. The tray is nice and big

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works well as said but is a little unstable or wobbly you might say. Works great for light use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: Needed it for meals for my 94 year old mother. Does what I need it to do. We do not use the cup holder as it doesn’t work well for her cups, she’s afraid they will fall over. It’s lightweight and easy to maneuver. Good value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Had a back surgery 2 days ago. This is lightweight so I am able to maneuver it under my chair. The adjustable top is pretty cool too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This little table has come in handy for so many things. So glad I purchased it. The only thing that bothers me is that when in the tallest height available, it loses it's sturdyness.
I use it for my laptop,
No me gusta que las patas lleve seguros que están duros de mover pero ya es cosas de diseño y no del vendedor

Very nice table for my use as I use my laptop when seated on my LaZBoy. It was easy to put together & is adjustable, heightwise.Two suggestions that I would find would make the table perfect: 1) deeper lip in the front so the laptop doesn't slide off and 2) wider legs, so it would span the width of the LaZBoy footrest, bringing the table & laptop closer.
I'm a semi invalid, this item is perfect for eating and I'm using it now to work on my computer
